import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LeaderboardPage=()=>{const[totals,setTotals]=useState([]);const[error,setError]=useState(null);// ‚úÖ Auto-switch backend base
const backendBase=window.location.hostname==='localhost'?'http://localhost:4000':'https://pickem-backend-2025.onrender.com';useEffect(()=>{fetch("".concat(backendBase,"/api/totals")).then(res=>{if(!res.ok)throw new Error('Totals file not found');return res.json();}).then(data=>{const sorted=[...data].sort((a,b)=>b.total-a.total);setTotals(sorted);}).catch(()=>{setError('Leaderboard data not available yet.');});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"page-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uD83C\uDFC6 Leaderboard"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:'red'},children:error}),!error&&totals.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{style:{width:'100%',borderCollapse:'collapse',marginTop:'20px',backgroundColor:'#fdfdfd',borderRadius:'8px',overflow:'hidden',boxShadow:'0 0 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.05)'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{style:{backgroundColor:'#f0f0f0',fontWeight:'bold'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{style:{padding:'12px',textAlign:'left'},children:"Game Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{style:{padding:'12px',textAlign:'left'},children:"Cumulative Points"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:totals.map((player,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{style:{backgroundColor:index%2===0?'#ffffff':'#f9f9f9'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{style:{padding:'10px'},children:player.player}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{style:{padding:'10px'},children:player.total})]},index))})]})]});};export default LeaderboardPage;
